module.name: Broadcast
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php The Broadcast module for FreePBX allows you to broadcast messages to your custoemrs or clients. You can create campaings and set start and end times. From their you can direct where you want the call to be directed to based on if a humna being or a answering machine answer the call. Upload your CDS list of names and numbers and start your campaign. You can also choose to get reports on your campaign daily or after the campaign completes.
